name: Wind-up Music Box
description: Adds a wind-up music box. Made for ModFest: Toybox!

name: StickerBomb!
description: Add an *explosive* splash of colour to your Minecraft world with stickers! decorate your builds or graffiti your friends' with these sticky crowd favorites!

name: Flying Frisbees
description: Adds frisbees that can be thrown and played with!

name: Spacey Figurines
description: A simple figurines mod, made for ModFest: Toybox.

name: Wabbajack
description: Sheogorath's infamous artifact, brought into Minecraft

name: Losing My Marbles!
description: Build your very own Marble Run with plenty of unique marbles and track pieces. Fully data-driven!

name: Paintbrush
description: Peacefully paint your world using brushes (and paint guns)

name: 5 Guys (Burgers and Fries)
description: Adds a burger and fries worth five guys when you eat it.

name: Toil and Trouble
description: Empower Cauldrons with additional functionality, including the ability to brew Potions.

name: Chiseled
description: Re-shape any [modded] blocks in a vanilla friendly way!

name: Mr. Potato Head
description: Build your own Mr. Potato Head that will enhance you when sitting in your offhand!

name: Hero Statue
description: Adds the Hero Statue block, which can hold an item, and be posed using redstone.

name: DIY-Die
description: Adds dice in Minecraft

name: Toy Water Gun
description: Adds a toy water gun that can shoot either water, lava or powder snow

name: Spring Boots
description: Adds spring boots

name: Blowing Bubbles
description: Colorful bubbles that can you can use as platforms, blocks, and more

name: Boing!
description: A Mod adding rubber swords to minecraft made for modfest: toybox

name: Grand Indestructible Kingdom
description: The strongest fortress in the entire world!

name: Crazy Pogo
description: Adds a pogo stick that lets you bounce off of surfaces

name: The Mad Hatter
description: Submission for ModFest 2025: Toybox. Adds a magical hat that can store near-endless items and retrieve them.

name: Simply Slingshot
description: Slingshot and multiple enchantments for it, making it a weapon and a tool. Damage entities, place and break blocks, throw items to your far away friend!

name: Mob Mystery Dollhouse
description: A "murder mystery" minigame (that can be run entirely serverside, or on your own!)

name: Confetti Cannon
description: This mods adds the Confetti Cannon. It deals knockback, so punch your friends around!

name: Toy Bricks
description: A Toy Brick themed blockset - Made for ModFest Toybox

name: Copper Cauldron
description: Adds a copper cauldron, used for various recipes

name: NotEnoughMinecraft
description: Did you ever want to play Minecraft inside of Minecraft without installing any mods on the client? NO??? Anyways, now you can!

name: Volo Volare
description: Step into a model glider and soar into a world of wonder.

name: Kaleidoscopes
description: Adds kaleidoscopes! Fun visuals! Made for the 1.21.8 ModFest, Toybox!

name: Lifelike
description: Cellular Automata simulators! For ModFest: Toybox

name: Mica
description: Mica is a magic mod consisting of individual runes that can be combined to great potential.

name: Power Towel
description: End-game weapon that can transform between multiple forms

name: Dominoes
description: Adds a collapsing domino block!

name: RC Toys
description: Remote controlled toys (currently just a car) in modern Minecraft!

name: Playful Planes
description: Throwable Paper Planes with a few surprises

name: Maglev
description: A new era of minecart technology

name: The Sword of Legend
description: Adds four cool looking sticks to fight with.

name: Action Mobs
description: A mod that adds pose-able mob statues to Minecraft.

name: Would you be a doll?
description: Become (slightly moreso) a doll! (a little thing that can ride around on others' shoulders, among other small tricks.)

name: Confetti Gunner
description: Like guns? Like confetti? This mods adds just that, alongside fun enchantments like recoil.

name: Confettinator
description: A block for dispensing confetti and fireworks with color configurable by redstone.

name: EVL Toys
description: Adds in a brand new toy, Mr Scoot! Very heavy WIP but uploading for ModFest: Toybox

name: Occipital Metonymy
description: physical homology

name: Showtime
description: Throw balls, bounce around, and just generally make a mess. Made for ModFest: Toybox.

name: Grow Your Crystal
description: This mod adds a way to grow your own crystal blocks, with customizable colors and effects

name: Totoro's Top
description: Bringing My Neighbor Totoro's Magical Top to Modfest: Toybox

name: New in Box!
description: Sometimes, the box is more fun than the toy inside.

name: Surpuncher
description: Adds extendable fists to Minecraft. I bring the punch!

name: Hyper Silt
description: Hyper Silt lets you BLJ

name: Jack In The Box
description: A prank mod made for Modfest: Toybox

name: Mannequin
description: Become a doll.

name: Densha no Omocha
description: An experimental version of an upcoming train mod. Adds toy trains to Minecraft!

name: citsabmoB
description: Bombastic 2: The Sequel Nobody Asked For

name: Zip To It!
description: Zip across the lands in style with a Zippy Sticky Hand! Made for ModFest Toybox!

name: More Than A Foxbox
description: Much more than just a fox in a box! More Than A Foxbox features familiar friends with configurable poses and noises.

name: yamaxanadu
description: A mod about action at a distance.

name: Dronebox
description: A mod that adds drones to minecraft created for modfest: toybox

name: Bloub 4 MC
description: Adds a physics toy to the inventory screen

name: Eye of Dreams
description: When night falls, new powers awake. Adds the Eye of Dreams to Minecraft

name: Not A Toy
description:
Adds things that are DEFINITELY not toys.
Created for Modfest Toybox

name: Telebaton
description: Adds teleportation batons to swap places with friends!

name: Laseredstone
description: Redstone but we use lasers to transfer signals

name: Slot Cars
description: Build and race on slot car tracks with your friends!

name: Chorus Honey
description: Mix Chorus Fruit and Honey to ascend to new heights!

name: Googun
description: Adds several new types of Googunâ„¢ Goo that can be shot onto terrain, changing how you traverse the world! Inspired by Portal 2's Gels.
